message: Welcome to our store! I hope you find something you like among our offerings. Our products are carefully selected to ensure quality, but please keep in mind that there is a 50% chance of receiving a low-quality item. Given this risk, we encourage you to consider our diverse selection and perhaps take advantage of our variety to increase your chances of satisfaction. Thank you for your interest!
